Title: s2RectUnion
Description: Returns the smallest rectangle containing the union of this rectangle and the given rectangle. In the S2 system, a rectangle is represented by a type of S2Region called a S2LatLngRect that represents a rectangle in latitude-longitude space.

s2Rect1PointLow, s2Rect1PointHi — Low and High S2 point indexes corresponding to the first rectangle. UInt64.s2Rect2PointLow, s2Rect2PointHi — Low and High S2 point indexes corresponding to the second rectangle. UInt64.
s2UnionRect2PointLow — Low S2 cell id corresponding to the union rectangle. UInt64.s2UnionRect2PointHi — High S2 cell id corresponding to the union rectangle. UInt64.
